description:
Enjoy that well-loved, pre-broken-in feeling from wear number one. Made from bestselling Cardiff fabric—with naturally bacteria resistant hemp—this men's must-have makes everyday outfitting easy.

And if knowing all that isn't enough to get you excited, then how about this: this sweater was made by Fair Trade Certified™Factory, which means it's part of a program that's changing lives in a positive way. Now throw it on, already!
name: Prana Cardiff Fleece Full Zip - Mens
